title: Data visualization with Python
description:
I provide `Python` code and examples for a wide variety of 
data visualizations, using the standard [machine learning workflow]() 
(explore, describe, infer, model, evaluate, tune, etc.) as a roadmap 
and letting the code and visualizations do most of the talking.
The custom stylesheet and plotting routines I reference throughout 
can be found in my [datavis_utils]() repository.
